meta.description: Maximize the flow of goods from the central distribution hub (Node 0) to the primary delivery station (Node 7) in a futuristic city.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of routes between nodes in thousands of units

vars.name: flow
vars.description: Flow of goods between nodes in thousands of units

vars.name: F
vars.description: Total flow from source (Node 0) to sink (Node 7)

objective.name: max_total_flow
objective.description: Maximize the total flow from Node 0 to Node 7

constraints.name: source_flow_balance
constraints.description: Flow balance at the source node (Node 0)

constraints.name: sink_flow_balance
constraints.description: Flow balance at the sink node (Node 7)

constraints.name: node_1_flow_conservation
constraints.description: Flow conservation at node 1

constraints.name: node_2_flow_conservation
constraints.description: Flow conservation at node 2

constraints.description: Flow conservation at node 3

constraints.description: Flow conservation at node 4

constraints.description: Flow conservation at node 5

constraints.name: node_6_flow_conservation
constraints.description: Flow conservation at node 6
